subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods said his surgically repaired knee would probably be no more than 85 percent when he returned, but he saw no reason why he could not get back to the level of play that brought him nine victories in 12 official events this year, no finish worse than a tie for fifth. Woods, during a video conference to announce the 16-man field for his Chevron World Challenge in December, said his goal was getting his body healthy for 2009 to compete at a high level.
